member.name: T:Accord.SingularMatrixException
member.summary: Singular Matrix Exception.

remarks.para: The singular matrix exception is thrown in cases where a method which performs matrix inversions has encountered a non-invertible matrix during the process.

member.name: T:Accord.NonPositiveDefiniteMatrixException
member.summary: Non-Positive Definite Matrix Exception.

remarks.para: The non-positive definite matrix exception is thrown in cases where a method expects a matrix to have only positive eigenvalues, such when dealing with covariance matrices.

member.name: T:Accord.ConvergenceException
member.summary: Algorithm Convergence Exception.

remarks.para: The algorithm convergence exception is thrown in cases where a iterative algorithm could not converge to a finite solution.

member.name: T:Accord.DimensionMismatchException
member.summary: Dimension Mismatch Exception.

remarks.para: The dimension mismatch exception is thrown in cases where a method expects a matrix or array object having specific or compatible dimensions, such as the inner matrix dimensions in matrix multiplication.
